The Commission shall consist of 17 members. Twelve of the members shall be appointed by the Board of Supervisors and five of the members shall be appointed by the Mayor as follows: 
     (a)     At least three women veterans. The Board of Supervisors shall appoint at least two members pursuant to this subsection; the Mayor shall appoint at least one member pursuant to this Subsection. 
     (b)     At least two members who served in the Armed Forces of the United States of America and who have a physical disability arising from that service, in accordance with the definitions applied in such cases by the Veterans' Administration. The Mayor and Board of Supervisors shall each appoint at least one member pursuant to this Subsection. 
     (c)     All members shall reside in the City and County of San Francisco, effective on the operative date of this section. The Board of Supervisors may only waive this requirement by ordinance. 
(Added by Ord. 449-82, App. 9/16/82; amended by Ord. 33-94, App. 1/21/94; Ord. 224-94, App. 6/9/94; Ord. 97-97, App. 3/21/97; Ord. 245-09, File No. 091241, App. 12/3/2009)
